title: The Women & Dirty John
description: In one of his most memorable classic episodes, Keith Morrison reports on conman John Meehan, who made national headlines last year after his crimes and their final, deadly culmination were featured in the popular podcast, ‘Dirty John.’
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
